page.title: 09FOOTBALL IN HARROW
page.content: { WEALDSTONE FOOTBALL CLUB}HAS ITS OWN RECREATION GROUND IN HARROW. THEY PLAY MATCHES EVERY WEEK AND GET ABOUT 900 SPECTATORS EACH TIME. THE ENTRY FEE IS Â£1.50 FOR ADULTS AND Â£0.80 FOR CHILDREN AND OLD AGE PENSIONERS. THE CAPACITY OF THE GROUND IS 1300. AT THE GROUND THEY HAVE NO PROBLEM WITH VIOLENCE. SEVEN PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED AT THE GROUND BUT ONLY ONE PERSON WORKS THERE FULL TIME. THE SECRETARY OF THE CLUB IS NICK DUGARD AND THE MANAGER IS BRIAN HALL. THE TEAM MEMBERS WEAR YELLOW TOPS WITH BLUE STRIPES AND THE SHORTS AND SOCKS ARE PLAIN BLUE. IN 1985 WEALDSTONE FOOTBALL CLUB WON THE{FOOTBALL {ASSOCIATION CHALLENGE CUP}AT WEMBLEY. THE TROPHY WAS IN THE FORM OF A FOOTBALL!
